ygData.subject: Re: warrior upgrade in new patch
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been getting 1 or 2 crit hits per fight. I got 12 or so in 1 hour of playing. I hit for around 62 with BIBS (at skill of 44), 24-32 with barbed whip
ygData.messageBody:
I have been getting 1 or 2 crit hits per fight. I got 12 or so in 1 hour of
playing. I hit for around 62 with BIBS (at skill of 44), 24-32 with barbed
whip (skill at 125), 22-30 with dragoon dirk (skill 125), and kicked for
24-28 (skill 125). I went from 673 to 704 hp and gained 12 points of mag
resist. I am a 24th dark elf warrior. I want to know if critical hits are
determined by dex (mine is 96).

Nochtero D'Ebonfury
Disciples of Innoruuk
Cazic-Thule.

-----Original Message-----
From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 12:21 PM
Subject: RE: [warriors_eq] warrior upgrade in new patch


>From: James Wofford <James.Wofford@...>
>
>I noticed last night I recieved 2 critical hits in about an hour of
playing.
>My magic resistance was pretty high... No idea because I never paid any
>attention to what the base vs what I know hoave is. But my resistance
>currently is 45. Also, I noticed exactly 0 change in my total hp. Nice to
>see that they did something with the warrior (and the rogues) in this
patch.
>Even if it seems like next to nothing at all.
>
>Dyvim Kincaid
>Stormrider of Cazic Thule.
>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Trent Carroll [mailto:trent@...]
>> Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 7:03 PM
>> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>> Subject: [warriors_eq] warrior upgrade in new patch
>>
>>
>> From: "Trent Carroll" <trent@...>
>>
>> The warrior upgrade is in the new patch.
>>
>> 1) Critical Strike happens about one in 60 hits for around double damage
>> 2) More HP. talked to a level 24 Troll warrior he got 34 more HP
>> overnight.
>> My level 14 Dark Elf Warrior went from 401 to 399 (yes I lost two hp)
>> 3) Magic resistance. I think you gain one magic resistance for every two
>> levels.
>>
